    • Method Detail

      • buildColumns

        protected void buildColumns()
        Overrides:
        buildColumns in class DataSource<Map>

      • getNamedColumn

        public javafx.scene.control.TableColumn getNamedColumn(String firstName)
        Description copied from class: DataSource
        Return the column that matches the provided name Subclasses typically have a constructor that accepts column names as Strings. The subclass specific parsing of the data will also create columns and the name of these columns will match the names provided with the constructor.

        When this method is called before the columns are build, the buildColumns method is called. Subclasses override this buildColumns method.

        Overrides:
        getNamedColumn in class DataSource<Map>
        Parameters:
        firstName - the name of the requested column. It is up to the subclass implementation to determine how a column and a name are matched.
        Returns:
        the TableColumn instance that matches the provided name.
